content: COVID Coach is a mobile phone application for civilians, Veterans, and service members affected by the COVID-19 pandemic.
COVID Coach is designed to help you improve your self-care and overall mental health during these difficult times.
Education about coping with this global pandemic
Tools to improve your emotional well-being
Trackers for tracking mental health over time
Trackers for working on personal goals that you set for yourself
It can be used as a stand-alone education and self-care tool, or to augment care with a healthcare professional.
